description:
With a new power and a new destiny, Mai must accept the abilities and burden that come with being a HiME. But the future that awaits her is a dangerous one. A meeting with the headmistress leads to much-needed answers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoo no Mai / Hoshi no Chikai
การร่ายรำแห่งเปลวเพลิง / คำอธิษฐานต่อดวงดาว
